property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury or engage to discard X favor to assign or discard X deferment tokens to or from a target non-Homeworld Dune Fief. Do not subdue Duchy of Arrakis when deploying Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury. Declaration Tactic: Engage to deploy Corrino Troop from your hand free of cost.

card.name: Dune Regency, Seat of the Oppressor

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 4 solaris in your treasury or engage to engage/disengage a target non-homeworld Dune city. Do not subdue Dune Regency when deploying Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative Tactic (declaration). Pay X solaris to increase or decrease your declared favor by X. X may not exceed Leto's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: You need not pay the deployment cost to assign ventures to Gurney.

card.name: Lady Jessica, Concubine of Duke Leto

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic (duration effect). Engage to reduce the force generated by a target rite participant by X. X equals Jessica's weirding rank.

card.name: Paul Atreides, Son of Duke Leto

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to assign X deferment tokens to a target subdued event. X equals Paul's prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Thufir may counter for any rite for which he possesses the corresponding talent.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic: If declared the target of a rite, engage Evangelina to engage any eligible persona to Counter. Eligible personas must posses the appropriate ability to Counter during that type of rite but they may be governed by a rival player.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Battle Tactic (declaration): When participating in a battle rite, Aramsham's resistance may be reduced by X to increase his battle rank by X. X may not exceed Aramsham's resistance. If his resistance is reduced to 0, vanquish Aramsham upon resolving the rite.

card.name: Dr. Kynes, Judge of the Change

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic (Duration effect): Engage to reduce the resistance of a target Dune holding by X. X equals Kyne's arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When you are the victor of a petition initiated by a rival, reduce the final deployment cost by 2 solaris.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic:(Voice Effect) Engage to apply X force to a target ally or aide. If the applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, engage the target ally or subdue the target aide. X equals Mohiam's Weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic: Engage to include Kardif as an additional participant in any battle rite. If Kardif is vanquished, discard 1+X favor. X equals the number of participating troops assigned to Kardif.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duncan gains Atreides allegiance if any player governs an Atreides noble. When assigned a Crysknife, Duncan gains +1 command and +1 battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Jarmush may Counter during dueling and battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic: (duration effect) Engage to redirect all force assigned to the Baron to another persona you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage and subdue to apply X force to a target ally. X equals Yueh's intrigue rank. If applied force equals or exceeds the target's resistance, subdue the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage and discard 2 favor to disengage a target fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Rites led by Piter do not count against your House Interval Limit.

card.name: Umman Kudu, Captain of the Guard

property.name: Operation
property.value: Umman may Counter during dueling and intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration tactic (Duration effect). Engage to increase the resistance and talent rank of a target Miner participant by +1 during an Intrigue or Arbitration rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When Jareh initiates and leads a battle rite, the defending player must engage the target as a participant if the target is currently disengaged.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Battle and Intrigue rites initiated and led by Styros may be considered either Landsraad or CHOAM rites, regardless of the type of rite initiated. You must declare what the rite will be considered when making your attack declaration.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 spice, assigning it to The Broken Land.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris. Battle Tactic (engagement). Assigned troops may be engaged to participate in battle rites targeting desert fiefs you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury. Battle Tactic (Declaration/Duration effect): Engage to add +2 to the resistance of a target Dune Fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: If your Homeworld is a Dune Fief, engage to make each of your rivals pay you X solaris. For each player, X equals the number of non-Homeworld Dune fiefs that player governs, or the number of solaris in that player's treasury, whichever is fewer.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 solari in your treasury per Sisterhood ally you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When petitioning to deploy cards having allegiance to your sponsor, you may reduce the final deployment cost by 2 for every favor you discard.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce the deployment cost of all equipment you assign to Fremen personas or personnel by 1 Solaris each.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of directorships you govern, excluding Directorship Kickbacks.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage and subdue a Harkonnen Ally you govern to disengage a fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Atreides noble. The target gains +2 command. Declaration Tactic. Engage the assigned target to disengage an Atreides persona or holding.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target physician or Suk. The target gains Suk subtype. If the target is vanquished during a rite, you gain X favor. X equals the target's command.

card.name: Lisan Al-Gaib, Voice of the Outer Worlds

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a noble heir. Declaration tactic: Engage to immediately end a rite in which any native persona or Dune fief you govern is declared a participant. The rite still counts against the attacker's House interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Engage the assigned persona to add or discard 1 deferment token to or from a deployed nexus event. If the assigned persona possesses the prescience talent, they may add or discard tokens from subdued nexus events as well.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target noble you govern. Each time you engage a Dune Fief to produce solaris or spice, you may discard 2 favor to increase the number of spice produced by 1 or the number of solaris produced by 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Dune fief you govern. If the target is vanquished during a battle rite, the attacking player must discard 1 favor per attack participant as a consequence of the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to your homeworld. If your favor is 0, or lower, assign X tokens to this decree when you are required to reduce or discard favor. X equals the number of favor you are required to discard or reduce. Declaration Tactic: Subdue and discard X assigned tokens to increase your favor by X.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target ally. Engage the assigned ally to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the assigned persona's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target adept. Declaration Tactic: Discard X favor to engage the target to immediately initiate an assigned weirding venture. X equals the deployment cost of the venture.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you vanquish a Dune fief during a battle rite. Venture. Produce X spice in your hoard. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you subdue or discard an event governed by a rival. Venture. Produce 4X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you vanquish a directorship during an arbitration rite. Venture: Produce X spice in your hoard. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time a defender you govern Counters and survives the rite. Venture: Produce 4X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you decrease the value of the CROE by increasing the number of spice in the Guild Hoard. Venture: Increase your favor by 2X. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign one program token each time you vanquish one or more allies having adversarial allegiance during an intrigue rite. Venture: Produce X spice in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you engage a desert you govern to produce spice in the Guild Hoard. Venture. Produce 4X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

card.name: Remain Invisible, Operate in the Shadows

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you earn last initiative rank as a result of playing one or more initiative tactics. Venture: Produce 4X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you vanquish a city or homeworld during a battle rite. Venture: Increase your favor by 2X. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you capture one or more allies during a rite. Venture: Produce X spice in your hoard. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you are the victor of a petition initiated by a rival. Venture: Increase your favor by 2X. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you earn first initiative rank as the result of playing one or more initiative tactics. Venture: Produce 4X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you vanquish one or more allies during a dueling rite. Venture. Produce X spice in your hoard. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you successfully petition to deploy an ally that is currently subdued within a rivals domain. Venture. Increase your favor by 2X. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign 1 program token each time you assign your sponsor's allegiance to an ally governed by a rival. Venture: Increase your favor by 2X. X equals the number of program tokens assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to discard X favor, producing 2X Solaris in your treasury. X may not exceed 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Trumane may Counter during dueling and intrigue rites targeting an Atreides persona you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue to capture a subdued aide, assigning it to Czigo. If the aide becomes deployed, immediately transfer it to its former governor's domain, retaining its status.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When Marauder leads a battle rite, you may capture any 1 projectile resource assigned to an opposing participant vanquished during the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to assign a target venture from your hand to an eligible persona governed by a rival. If the rival initiates the venture, either produce X solaris in your treasury or increase you favor by X. X equals the deployment cost of the venture.

card.name: Imperial Suk, of the Inner Circle

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic: Engage and subdue to deploy a target subdued persona in your domain. The target need not be assigned any deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When assigned a craft, Lighter Pilot gains surprise during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Lt. Erta may Counter during intrigue or dueling rites targeting Corrino persona you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Fedor may counter during battle rites targeting a Dune fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Kinet is immune to the effects generated by weirding ventures and Voice effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Marduk is immune to capture and discard effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Master of Arms may use either assigned blade or assigned projectile weapons during dueling and battle rites. Battle/Dueling Tactic (declaration). Declare which type of assigned weapons will generate effects during the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to disengage a target native persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic: Engage to add +2 to the arbitration rank or resistance of a target charter you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When deploying Coriolis Storm events, you may apply the generated Storm force directly to a target Dune fief.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target desert. Battle Tactic (declaration). Troops assigned to the target may be declared additional participants during battle rites targeting any desert fiefs.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Arbitration rites led by the target may be declared and resolved as Landsraad rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 2: Discard 1 favor and assign to a target persona. During the disengage phase, the target's governor must either pay you 2 solaris or discard one favor to disengage the target.

card.name: Deep Training, in the Weirding Way

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Target gains +2 weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a target persona. When participating in rites, the target generates +1 force per assigned division.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +2 command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a target persona. Target gains +2 Prescience rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target city or homeworld governed by a rival. When engaged to produce solaris, produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the target's command rank. If assigned to a Dune fief, you may deploy native personas and Dune events.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a fief you govern. Blade and projectile weapons may be assigned to House Armory. Engage and pay X solaris to transfer X assigned weapons to any number of eligible targets you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target city. Target gains subtype outpost and +1 battle rank. Declaration Tactic: Engage to deploy any personnel from your hand. You must pay the full deployment cost for each, and assign each to an eligible target you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to an ally. When initiating a petition for a target having the same allegiance as the ally, reduce the listed deployment cost by X. X equals the ally's command. The listed deployment cost may never be reduced below 0.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. During battle rites, the target generates +X force. X equals the target's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. During arbitration rites, the target generated +X force. X equals the target's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a persona you govern. Engage the assigned persona and pay X solaris to apply X force to a target equipment resource. If applied force exceeds the target's deployment cost, discard the target. X may not exceed the target's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a target Sardaukar persona or Corrino troop. Target gains +2 resistance and is immune to capture effects.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a persona. The target may not be assigned any ventures.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target homeworld or city. Target gains +1 command, +2 battle rank and +4, resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target subdued event. The target is immune to effects generated by prescience ventures and tactics.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a resource assigned directly or indirectly to a Dune fief. Its governor must either pay 1 solari during the disengage phase or else subdue the resource.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a target persona. If the persona becomes engaged, its governor must discard X favor and discard Tahaddi Al-Burhan. X equals the target's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The persona gains the subtype "Pilot". If assigned a craft, the persona loses 2 command (to a minimum of 0).

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. target may initiate weirding rites targeting personas. A weirding rite must be declared as either a Landsraad or CHOAM rite and is conducted by using weirding rank to calculate force.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a target Mentat or assassin persona. You may ignore talent requirements when assigning intrigue ventures to the target. Engage Assassin's Handbook to initiate an intrigue venture assigned to the target persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to target pilot not currently assigned a craft. Battle Tactic (engagement). When target is engaged to participate in a battle rite, engage to include Battle-Rigged 'Thopter as a participant

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target troop or fief. Target generates +X force during battle rites. X equals the target's battle rank. Even if applied sufficient force, do not vanquish any opposing participants that are assigned shield resources.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Engage to transfer a venture assigned to the target persona to another eligible persona having the same allegiance or no allegiance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or personnel you govern. The assigned target loses all current allegiance and is considered to have no allegiance. If vanquished during a rite, the target does not count as a participant with regard to determining the solari or favor reward of the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Spice Harvester. Target gains +1 resistance. When engaging the Harvester to transfer spice, you may either ignore paying the 1 solari or you may pay 2 solaris to transfer 2 spice.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to an ally not already assigned a blade. The ally gains +1 dueling rank. The ally may not be declared the target of rites initiated by Fremen personas.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target fief assigned a bastion or a target pilot assigned a craft. When participating in battle rites, the target generates +3 force.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Assign to a persona you govern. Target gains subtype native. Duration Tactic: If you govern a Dune fief, you may subdue Manual of the Friendly Desert to assign one deferment token to the assigned persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target pilot not currently assigned a craft. Battle Tactic (declaration): Engage to either add +2 to the force generated by your leader or to give your leader surprise.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target pilot not currently assigned a craft. When leading battle rites the target and all of its assigned troops are immune to force generated by opposing troops.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. If assigned to Arrakeen, gain 1 favor per Arrakeen Richece that survives any rite targeting Arrakeen.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. If assigned to an Atreides persona or fief, Atreides Brigade gains +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (declaration): Subdue to add +2 force generated by the assigned target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement): If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Dune fief. When participating in a battle rite, the attacker must discard X favor per Folk of Grabban and Pan that are vanquished during the rite. X equals the number of attack participants. Discard Folk of Grabban and Pan when vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. If vanquished during a Battle rite, you must discard Fremen Band.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target fief you govern. If Security Division is vanquished during a battle rite, the attacking player must discard 1 favor.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. When participating in attacks targeting desert fiefs, you may capture 1 assigned spice per participating Harvesting Outfit if the target desert is vanquished.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement): Pay X solaris to give X Hellhound troops surprise.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. If the target possesses Sisterhood allegiance, Honor Guard does not count against the target's command limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Hydraulic Initiative Corps gains surprise when participating in intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Declaration Tactic. If the assigned persona or charter is declared the target of an arbitration rite, engage to give a target disengaged persona having the arbitration talent the ability to counter.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. If the opposing leader is vanquished during a battle rite in which a Drop-Battalion participates, gain 1 favor per surviving Drop-Battalion.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to the opposing leader. If vanquished, you may opt not to subdue the assigned leader and any of its assigned participants, gaining X solaris instead. X equals the leader's deployment cost +1 per additional participant left unsubdued

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your leader. When distributing force, you may divide your force among the opposing participants as you wish, ignoring the normal order of distribution.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target leader. Group the leader and X assigned participants to count as a single battle participant. Ignore the operations and card types of the assigned participants, observing only the type and operation of the target leader.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target leader. Group the leader and X assigned participants to count as a single duel participant. Ignore the operations and card types of the assigned participants, observing only the type and operation of the target leader.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer up to X ventures assigned to a target persona you govern to other eligible personas you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your leader. When distributing force, you may divide your force among the opposing participants as you wish, ignoring the normal order of distribution.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target leader. Group the leader and X assigned participants to count as a single intrigue participant. Ignore the operations and card types of the assigned participants, observing only the type and operation of the target leader.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to your rival's leader. If assigned sufficient force to be vanquished, you may allow the leader and its additional participants to survive, gaining X favor instead. X equals the leader's deployment cost +1 per additional participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Discard X favor to increase or decrease a target player's assembly limit by X. X may not exceed 2.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to your leader. When distributing force, you may divide your force among the opposing participants as you wish, ignoring the normal order of distribution.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target noble you govern. You may bid as if you possessed 10 additional solaris in your treasury. If you are the victor and cannot pay the full deployment cost, you must discard the target noble.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue a target aide you govern to subdue a target aide governed by a rival.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Pay X solaris to increase or decrease a target player's declared favor by X.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target leader. Group the leader and X assigned participants to count as a single arbitration participant. Ignore the operations and card types of the assigned participants, observing only the type and operation of the target leader.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1: Discard X favor and assign to a target rival's homeworld. Duration Effect: After all initiative ranks are assigned, change the target's governor's initiative rank to X. Players must draw cards normally to break any ranking ties this effect creates.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to the opposing leader. If vanquished, you may opt not to subdue the assigned leader and any of its assigned participants, gaining X solaris instead. X equals the leader's deployment cost +1 per additional participant left unsubdued.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration effect. Target an ally you govern to increase your declared favor by X. X equals twice the target's deployment cost. If you fail to achieve initiative rank 1, you must discard the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Pay 2X solaris to increase or decrease a target player's hand limit by X. X may not exceed 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the target of the Petition, negating all previous bids. Reduce the target's deployment cost to 0. All players now bid using favor. The victor must discard the entire amount of favor bid and, if the Petitioner, must also pay the listed deployment cost in solaris.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Deploy a target resource from your hand by paying its deployment cost and assigning it to an eligible target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer up to X target personnel and/or equipment you govern from an assigned target to a new eligible target you govern. The target cards retain their current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard X favor to subdue X ventures or programs assigned to a single target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a dueling rite. Discard all participants vanquished during the rite. This rite counts against your House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a dueling rite naming any fief as the target. This rite is considered a Landsraad rite and counts against your House Interval Limit. Only the defending player may deploy dueling tactics during the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate an intrigue rite naming any charter as the target. This rite is considered a CHOAM rite and counts against your House Interval Limit. Only the defending player may deploy intrigue tactics during the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target venture assigned to a rival persona to an eligible persona you govern. X equals the deployment cost of the target venture.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a petition to capture a target subdued aide. All players participate as petitioners with the victor capturing the target upon paying the previous governor the final deployment cost. Assign 1 deferment token to the target upon resolution.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Exchange a target charter you govern with a target charter governed by a rival. Each retains it's current status. Cards assigned to each charter transfer to the other. If the charters have different deployment costs, the player receiving the cheaper charter gains favor equal to the difference.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to initiate a petition for a target equipment resource you govern. All players participate as petitioners with the victor deploying the target in their own domain upon paying you the final deployment cost. This target is deployed in the disengaged position.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue a target nexus event and discard its assigned deferment tokens. X equals the number of assigned deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target persona you govern to a rival's domain, retaining its current status. The rival must either pay you solaris equal to the target's deployment cost or discard an equal amount of favor. Once transferred, the rival becomes the new governor of the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage an eligible persona governed by a rival to initiate a rite against a target governed by any player. You are considered the attacking player during the rite, but you and the persona's governor both collect the full reward if the target of the rite is vanquished. This rite counts against your House interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a Suk you govern. Pay X solaris to discard a target skill enhancement. X equals the target's deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a battle rite naming any persona having battle talent as the target. This rite is considered a Landsraad rite and counts against your House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate an arbitration rite naming any persona having arbitration talent as the target. This rite is considered a CHOAM rite and counts against your House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Initiate a rite. Ignore all effects generated by counter operations and/or tactics for the duration of the rite. This rite counts against your House Interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate a battle rite. Discard all non-fief participants vanquished during the rite. This rite counts against your House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Pay X solaris to discard a target event located in any player's domain. If the target is subdued, X equals the number of deferment tokens assigned to the target. If deployed, X equals the target's final deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target ally governed by a rival. X equals the weirding rank of the assigned persona. If the applied force exceeds the target's resistance, turn the target face down and transfer it to the owner's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiate an intrigue rite. Discard all participants vanquished during the rite. This rite counts against your House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: The first arbitration rite a player initiates against each of their rivals does not count against their House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Your rivals must either pay you 2 solaris per Dune contract they govern or subdue each contract for which they do not pay.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. As a general operation of their House intervals, all players may engage any personnel they govern to transfer them from an assigned target to another, eligible target they govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration effect: Discard all troops vanquished during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Players who govern one or more Dune fiefs may buy no more than 3 favor during their House intervals.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a number of spice from the Guild Hoard equal to the number of players in the game. X equals the CROE. Each player must immediately transfer one spice to the Guild Hoard or discard X favor. Reset the CROE upon completion.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: The first battle rite a player initiates against each of their rivals does not count against their House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. During the initiative phase, all players may increase their declared favor by an amount equal to the number of sponsor allies they govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: The first intrigue rite a player initiates against each of their rivals does not count against their House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: During the deferment phase, do not assign tokens to troops already assigned one or more deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Players initiating CHOAM rites who fail to vanquish their declared target must discard X favor. X equals 1 per attack participant or their current total favor, whichever is less.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: The first dueling rite a player initiates against each of their rivals does not count against their House Interval Limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Whenever personas or personnel are captured or discarded, all of their assigned equipment remains assigned, also either being captured or discarded.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Players initiating Landsraad rites who fail to vanquish their declared targets must discard X favor. X equals 1 per attack participant or their current total favor, whichever is less.
